entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
